title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Webedia
transformers_text: We be dia S A is a company specializing in online media a subsidiary of the Fim a lac group based in Levallois Perret France We be dia is active in more than twenty countries including France All oC in Jeux video com MG G Pure m dias Pure people Pure shopping Pure break Terra fem in a 750 g easy Voyage Brazil Ad oro Cinema Tudo Gos to so Minh avid a Germany Film starts Movie pilot GameStar Spain and Latin America X a taka Sens a Cine Raise r Games Poland Gry Online and Get Hero and the United States Boxoffice Pro We be dia was created in France in 2007 2 following the successive launches of the websites Pure people Pure trend and Pure fans We be dia bought the comparison shopping websiteS hopo on in 2008 3 and renamed it Pure shopping and the website O zap media news from M 6 group in 2011 4 and renamed it Pure m dias We be dia was acquired by Fim a lac in May 2013 5 and became its Internet media subsidiary In 2013 Fim a lac acquired All oC in 6 the websites News ring and You mag 7 the cooking website 750 g 8 and the cultural platform Exp on aute 9 In 2014 We be dia acquired Over Blog 10 Jeux video com through L ' O dys s e Interactive 11 and moved to Paris in 2015 12 13 Movie pilot Germany 14 15 and Game o Consulting owner of Millenium electronic sports 16 In December 2014 We be dia announced a license agreement with Ziff Davis to launch sites under the IGN franchise in Brazil and France at the beginning of 2015 17 The French version of IGN was launched on 2 it targets the general public and casual gamers 18 In 2015 We be dia acquired C t C in Group technological solutions for movie theaters and specialized press magazines BoxOffice Pro in the United States and C t C in in France 19 57 of Easy voyage group online travel comparator s Easy vol and A lib a buy 20 Mix i com website Jeux Act u and multi channel network 21 50 of the Brazilian network Para maker 21 and West World Media digital marketing company for the film industry 22 In 2016 We be dia bought Sci mob mobile video game studio 23 Surprize mi home delivered surprise boxes 24 Ek la blog blogging platform 25 Oxen t e Sports World Convention and Bang Bang Management sports PR agency 26 In addition an agreement is made with Paris Saint Germain for We be dia to recruit and manage e sports players on behalf of Paris Saint Germain e Sports 27 On November 15 2016 the L FP announced that it had reached an agreement with be IN Sports and We be dia for the broadcasting of the first edition of the e League 1 28 The competition is renewed for two additional seasons on July 26 2017 the broadcasting agreements are renewed 29 On December 8 2016 We be dia joined forces with Chrono post to launch Pour deb on a home delivery service that connects Internet users and labeled producers AOC organic AB etc We be dia has a slight majority 53 in this new platform 30 On January 19 2017 We be dia announced the acquisition of the English company Peach Digital specializing in web development and digital marketing for movie theaters 31 In February 2017 Le Figaro announced that We be dia had invested 10 million euros in Ill ico Fresco a home delivery service for baskets of recipes 32 The same month F DJ and We be dia announced a partnership for the creation of e Sports competitions a professional one F DJ Masters League and another one for amateur gamers F DJ Open Series starting in March 2017 They are broadcast on We be dia's Web TV 33 At the end of February 2017 the media group finalized the acquisition of My Pose o aS a aS publisher specialized on SEO analytics 34 On March 8 2017 We be dia launched Le Stream aT witch Web TV dedicated to video games the result of two years of development in the company of several YouTuber s including Cy p rien and S que ez ie 35 36 On March 29 2017 We be dia bought the Brazilian web publisher Minh a Vida a website devoted to health nutrition beauty and fitness which attracts 14 3 million unique monthly visitors 37 38 We be dia reaches 44 million unique visitors in Brazil and thus becomes the leading publisher on entertainment themes 39 In June 2017 the company made its largest international acquisition with the American agency 3 Black Dot a media and marketing agency focused on video gamers 40 The agency based in Los Angeles manages 36 YouTuber s followed by millions of subscribers on their channels which total 700 million videos viewed per month 41 In July 2017 We be dia bought I DZ an audiovisual production company and thus strengthened its production activities and its leadership on the YouTube channel networks in France 42 That year We be dia was the first French media group to use the measurement of their global audiences by Com score It represents de duplicated coverage on desktops laptops smartphones and tablets and includes audiences for websites mobile applications and videos This new measure allows We be dia to establish a de duplicated global audience of 177 million unique visitors in April 2017 43 In October 2017 We be dia announced its intention to launch aTV channel dedicated to electronic sports called ES 1 The channel was officially launched on January 10 2018 on Orange TV 44 and on February 6 2018 on Free and Bouy gue s Telecom 45 In November 2017 We be dia with the support of CDC International Capital entered into exclusive negotiations with the Saudi company U turn Entertainment specializing in online entertainment particularly on YouTube and the production of digital content for the region's youth with a view to merging it with Diwan ee a We be dia subsidiary in the Middle East for an amount close to 100 million 46 In December 2017 We be dia acquired a majority stake in the United States based company called Creators Media which brings together social and video production platforms specializing in popular culture and entertainment 47 That same month We be dia joined forces with Elephant Emmanuel Chain's audiovisual production company to create a new content production label aimed at Millennial s 48 In January 2018 We be dia launched a sports marketing agency Only Sports Passions 49 That same month Ill ico Fresco specialist in the delivery of kit meals belonging to We be dia joined forces with Weight Watchers the world leader in slimming products 50 In April 2018 We be dia published new audience figures in partnership with Com score 188 million unique monthly visitors in December 2017 an increase of 6 2 compared to the previous measure dating from April 2017 51 The same month We be dia unveils its ambitions concerning content production as a partnership with the video game studio Focus Home Interactive is signed with a title Fear the Wolves already planned for 2018 co production projects of films cartoons or series are announced 52 In July 2018 We be dia bought the American authors company Full Fathom Five a company that helps authors produce books TV series films and video games 53 In October 2018 We be dia announced that it was focusing on bothe sports clubs PS G E sports and Le Stream E sport The first one being geared towards international competitions and the second devoted mainly to the French e sports scene The Millenium brand is thus refocusing around its media activities and e sports merchandising products and the Millenium e sport club being gradually closed 54 The same month the company announced the acquisition of Weblogs a Spanish speaking website publisher there by strengthening its activity in Spain and Latin America 55 On October 22 2018 We be dia announced the merger of BoxOffice magazine with Film Journal International 56 On November 13 2018 Groupe SEB announced the acquisition from We be dia of 750 g International the international branch of the French recipe site 750 g the original French website 750 g com being retained by We be dia The group is thus separating from Gourmand ize United States and United Kingdom Heim Gourmet Germany Reba ando Spain Re ce it as Sem Front eir as Brazil Portugal and Tri b Go los a Italy 57 The same month We be dia joined forces with Riot Games to launch the French League of League of Legends L FL the first French professional league on the League of Legends game which will bring together the 8 best teams on the French scene 58 In March 2019 We be dia bought 51 of the audiovisual production company Elephant 59 The new set will weigh 500 million euros a quarter of which will be made outside France 60 The same month We be dia purchased a majority stake in the company Part oo which publishes aS a aS platform specializing in local marketing for brands and merchants 61 On March 14 2019 a new measurement of the international audience of We be dia sites was produced by Com score posting 250 million unique visitors in December 2018 up 9 2 compared to December 2017 62 In June 2019 the group joined forces with Michel Cy mes a famous doctor and French TV host by taking a majority stake in his company Club Sant D bat in order to develop a health platform around the Dr Good Brand 63 In September 2019 We be dia regrouped its cinema to graphic activities All oC in C t C in Group West World Media Peach Digital under the brand The Boxoffice Company for marketing database and business intelligence services for film professionals 64 65 In November 2019 the French YouTuber Mi chou joined the network of talents and influence rs managed by We be dia 66 On November 14 2019 the movie Queen and Slim starring Daniel Kalu u ya and Jodie Turner Smith co produced by We be dia through its subsidiary 3 Black Dot and distributed by Universal Pictures was released in the United States It grossed a total 47 million revenue worldwide 67 In December 2019 We be dia announced the distribution of its ES 1 channel dedicated to e sport in Quebec in partnership with Them a Canal group then in January 2020 the distribution in France of the ES 1 channel within the Canal offers On April 20 2020 We be dia published a new measurement of the international audiences of its sites with Com score with 276 million unique monthly visitors measured in December 2019 an increase of 10 4 over one year 68 In July 2020 We be dia announced that its ES 1 TV channel brought together more than 1 3 million viewers in France 69 On July 28 2020 the French League of League of Legends L FL produced by We be dia resumes service in a format adapted to the health crisis with a final happening in Monaco on October 26 2020 70 In September 2020 the international tennis player Gael Monfils and Paralympic swimmer Th o Cur in joined the portfolio of e sports and sports talents managed by We be dia for their digital communication 71 In October 2020 the 750 g 72 and Millenium 73 sites announced an overhaul of their positioning and graphic identities Millenium becomes MG G and develops in 5 international versions 73 On October 4 2020 We be dia and Bani jay Iberia launched Top Gamers Academy in Spain the first TV reality show in the world of video games This program which brings together the greatest Spanish YouTuber s El Ru bius The Gre fg is broadcast on the Spanish channel Neo x and on social and video networks in particular on Twitch and YouTube 74 On November 16 2020 We be dia joined forces with J amy G our maud to create a new editorial brand around knowledge called Epic u rieux The brand is available on social and video networks Facebook Insta gram YouTube Snap chat and contributes to a television program broadcast on France 5 produced by Elephant We be dia group and presented by J amy G our maud C J amy 75 76 In December 2020 ES 1 announced its arrival in France on Amazon's Prime Video service 77 On January 19 2021 the French League of League of Legends L FL produced by We be dia resumed for a third season 78 In March 2021 We be dia brought together all of its new talent management labels under the We be dia Creators umbrella and announced the arrival of the Tik to kers group La French House among its creators as well as the company Smile Conseil notably representing the influence r Just Ri adh 79 In May 2021 We be dia reinvested 15 million euros in its subsidiary Part oo of which the group is the majority shareholder in order to enable it to achieve a new stage in its international development 80 We be dia is present in around twenty countries France Germany Spain Brazil Mexico Argentina Chile Colombia United States United Kingdom Poland Turkey Lebanon United Arab Emirates Saudi Arabia Morocco Tunisia Singapore Brazil is the group's leading country in terms of audience with 60 million unique monthly visitors in December 2018 followed by France 48 million and Spain 24 million 81 Since 2020 We be dia has organized its activities around a media talents production triptych 82 We be dia's activities in France which reach a total of 48 million unique monthly visitors 81 include We be dia's activities in Germany 10 million unique monthly visitors include 103 We be dia's activities in Brazil reach 60 million unique monthly visitors on the following activities 81 107 We be dia Espa a has different assets that collect 24 million unique monthly visitors 81 55 We be dia gathers 40 million unique monthly visitors 109 in Mexico and Latin America on the following activities We be dia is present in the United States through the following activities 110 We be dia is present in Turkey around a single activity We be dia co owns with Five Capital CDC International Capital the subsidiary We be dia Arabia a merger of its previous subsidiary Diwan ee and the company U turn Entertainment with establishments in the United Arab Emirates Lebanon and Saudi Arabia C d ric Sir is CEO of We be dia and V roni que Moral i President of the Board 2 On September 17 2015 the group inaugurated its new headquarters in Levallois Perret in presence of Axel le Lem aire V roni que Moral i the president of the group's management board Marc La dre it de Lac harri re founder and CEO of Fim a lac parent company of We be dia and C d ric Sir CEO of We be dia and its new flagship YouTuber s and creators 111
